trans-unit.source:
Methods marked with [AssemblyCleanup] should follow the following layout to be valid: -it can't be declared on a generic class -it should be public -it should be static -it should not be async void -it should not be a special method (finalizer, operator...). -it should not be generic -it should not take any parameter -return type should be void, Task or ValueTask
The type declaring these methods should also respect the following rules: -The type should be a class. -The class should be public or internal (if the test project is using the [DiscoverInternals] attribute). -The class shouldn't be static. -The class should be marked with [TestClass] (or a derived attribute) -the class should not be generic.
trans-unit.target: 标记有 [AssemblyCleanup] 的方法应遵循以下布局才会有效: - 是 “public” - 是 “static” - 不是泛型的，也不是在泛型类上定义的 - 不采用任何参数 - 返回类型应为 "void"、"Task" 或 "ValueTask" - 不是 “async void” - 不是特殊方法(终结器、运算符...)。

trans-unit.source: AssemblyCleanup method '{0}' signature is invalid
trans-unit.target: AssemblyCleanup 方法“{0}”签名无效

trans-unit.source: AssemblyCleanup methods should have valid layout
trans-unit.target: AssemblyCleanup 方法应具有有效的布局

trans-unit.source:
Methods marked with [AssemblyInitialize] should follow the following layout to be valid: -it can't be declared on a generic class -it should be public -it should be static -it should not be async void -it should not be a special method (finalizer, operator...). -it should not be generic -it should take one parameter of type TestContext -return type should be void, Task or ValueTask
The type declaring these methods should also respect the following rules: -The type should be a class. -The class should be public or internal (if the test project is using the [DiscoverInternals] attribute). -The class shouldn't be static. -The class should be marked with [TestClass] (or a derived attribute) -the class should not be generic.
trans-unit.target: 标记有 [AssemblyInitialize] 的方法应遵循以下布局才会有效: - 是 “public” - 是 “static” - 不是泛型的，也不是在泛型类上定义的 - 采用 “TestContext” 类型的单个参数 - 返回类型应为 "void"、"Task" 或 "ValueTask" - 不是 “async void” - 不是特殊方法(终结器、运算符...)。

trans-unit.source: AssemblyInitialize method '{0}' signature is invalid
trans-unit.target: AssemblyInitialize 方法“{0}”签名无效

trans-unit.source: AssemblyInitialize methods should have valid layout
trans-unit.target: AssemblyInitialize 方法应具有有效的布局

trans-unit.source: Prefer adding an additional assertion that checks for null
trans-unit.target: 首选添加检查 null 的其他断言

trans-unit.source: Avoid conditional access in assertions
trans-unit.target: 避免断言中的条件访问

trans-unit.source: 'Assert.AreEqual', 'Assert.AreNotEqual', 'Assert.AreSame' and 'Assert.AreNotSame' expects the expected value to be passed first and the actual value to be passed as second argument.
trans-unit.target: “Assert.AreEqual”、“Assert.AreNotEqual”、“Assert.AreSame” 和 “Assert.AreNotSame” 要求先传递预期值，然后将实际值作为第二个参数传递。

trans-unit.source: Assertion arguments should be passed in the correct order. 'actual' and 'expected'/'notExpected' arguments have been swapped.
trans-unit.target: 应按正确的顺序传递断言参数。已交换 “actual” 和 “expected”/“notExpected” 参数。

trans-unit.source: Assertion arguments should be passed in the correct order
trans-unit.target: 应按正确的顺序传递断言参数

trans-unit.source: Prefer 'Assert.ThrowsException' or 'Assert.ThrowsExceptionAsync' over '[ExpectedException]' as it ensures that only the expected call throws the expected exception. The assert APIs also provide more flexibility and allow you to assert extra properties of the exeption.
trans-unit.target: 首选 "Assert.ThrowsException" 或 "Assert.ThrowsExceptionAsync" 而不是 "[ExpectedException]"，因为它确保只有预期调用才会引发预期异常。断言 API 还提供更多的灵活性，并允许你断言异常的额外属性。

trans-unit.source: Prefer 'Assert.ThrowsException/ThrowsExceptionAsync' over '[ExpectedException]'
trans-unit.target: 首选 "Assert.ThrowsException/ThrowsExceptionAsync" 而不是 "[ExpectedException]"

trans-unit.source: Avoid '[ExpectedException]'
trans-unit.target: 避免 "[ExpectedException]"

trans-unit.source:
Methods marked with [ClassCleanup] should follow the following layout to be valid: -it can't be declared on a generic class without the InheritanceBehavior mode is set -it should be public -it should be static -it should not be async void -it should not be a special method (finalizer, operator...). -it should not be generic -it should not take any parameter -return type should be void, Task or ValueTask -InheritanceBehavior.BeforeEachDerivedClass attribute parameter should be specified if the class is abstract. -InheritanceBehavior.BeforeEachDerivedClass attribute parameter should not be specified if the class is `sealed`.
The type declaring these methods should also respect the following rules: -The type should be a class. -The class should be public or internal (if the test project is using the [DiscoverInternals] attribute). -The class shouldn't be static. -If the class is sealed, it should be marked with [TestClass] (or a derived attribute) -the class should not be generic.
trans-unit.target:
Methods marked with [ClassCleanup] should follow the following layout to be valid: -it can't be declared on a generic class without the InheritanceBehavior mode is set -it should be public -it should be static -it should not be async void -it should not be a special method (finalizer, operator...). -it should not be generic -it should not take any parameter -return type should be void, Task or ValueTask -InheritanceBehavior.BeforeEachDerivedClass attribute parameter should be specified if the class is abstract. -InheritanceBehavior.BeforeEachDerivedClass attribute parameter should not be specified if the class is `sealed`.
The type declaring these methods should also respect the following rules: -The type should be a class. -The class should be public or internal (if the test project is using the [DiscoverInternals] attribute). -The class shouldn't be static. -If the class is sealed, it should be marked with [TestClass] (or a derived attribute) -the class should not be generic.

trans-unit.source: ClassCleanup method '{0}' signature is invalid
trans-unit.target: ClassCleanup 方法“{0}”签名无效

trans-unit.source: ClassCleanup methods should have valid layout
trans-unit.target: ClassCleanup 方法应具有有效的布局

trans-unit.source:
Methods marked with [ClassInitialize] should follow the following layout to be valid: -it can't be declared on a generic class without the InheritanceBehavior mode is set -it should be public -it should be static -it should not be async void -it should not be a special method (finalizer, operator...). -it should not be generic -it should take one parameter of type TestContext -return type should be void, Task or ValueTask -InheritanceBehavior.BeforeEachDerivedClass attribute parameter should be specified if the class is abstract. -InheritanceBehavior.BeforeEachDerivedClass attribute parameter should not be specified if the class is `sealed`.
The type declaring these methods should also respect the following rules: -The type should be a class. -The class should be public or internal (if the test project is using the [DiscoverInternals] attribute). -The class shouldn't be static. -If the class is sealed, it should be marked with [TestClass] (or a derived attribute) -the class should not be generic.
trans-unit.target:
Methods marked with [ClassInitialize] should follow the following layout to be valid: -it can't be declared on a generic class without the InheritanceBehavior mode is set -it should be public -it should be static -it should not be async void -it should not be a special method (finalizer, operator...). -it should not be generic -it should take one parameter of type TestContext -return type should be void, Task or ValueTask -InheritanceBehavior.BeforeEachDerivedClass attribute parameter should be specified if the class is abstract. -InheritanceBehavior.BeforeEachDerivedClass attribute parameter should not be specified if the class is `sealed`.
The type declaring these methods should also respect the following rules: -The type should be a class. -The class should be public or internal (if the test project is using the [DiscoverInternals] attribute). -The class shouldn't be static. -If the class is sealed, it should be marked with [TestClass] (or a derived attribute) -the class should not be generic.

DataRow 条目应具有以下布局才能有效: - 应仅在测试方法上进行设置； - 参数计数应与方法参数计数匹配； - 参数类型应与方法参数类型匹配。

trans-unit.source: It's considered a good practice to have only test classes marked public in a test project.
trans-unit.target: 在测试项目中仅将测试类标记为“公开”是一种不错的做法。

trans-unit.source: Public type '{0}' should be marked with '[TestClass]' or changed to 'internal'
trans-unit.target: 公共类型“{0}”应标记为“[TestClass]”或更改为“internal”

trans-unit.source: Public types should be test classes
trans-unit.target: 公共类型应为测试类

trans-unit.source: Without using 'ClassCleanupBehavior.EndOfClass', the '[ClassCleanup]' will by default be run at the end of the assembly and not at the end of the class.
trans-unit.target: 如果不使用 "ClassCleanupBehavior.EndOfClass"，"[ClassCleanup]" 将默认在程序集末尾运行，而不是在类的末尾运行。

trans-unit.source: Use 'ClassCleanupBehavior.EndOfClass' with the '[ClassCleanup]'
trans-unit.target: 将 "ClassCleanupBehavior.EndOfClass" 与 "[ClassCleanup]" 配合使用

trans-unit.source: Use 'ClassCleanupBehavior.EndOfClass' with the '[ClassCleanup]'
trans-unit.target: 将 "ClassCleanupBehavior.EndOfClass" 与 "[ClassCleanup]" 配合使用

trans-unit.source: Test classes, classes marked with the '[TestClass]' attribute, should respect the following layout to be considered valid by MSTest: - it should be 'public' (or 'internal' if '[assembly: DiscoverInternals]' attribute is set) - it should not be 'static' (except if it contains only 'AssemblyInitialize' and/or 'AssemblyCleanup' methods) - it should not be generic.
trans-unit.target: 测试类(标记有“[TestClass]”属性的类)应遵循以下布局，才能被 MSTest 视为有效: - 它应为 "public" (如果设置了“[assembly: DiscoverInternals]”属性，则应为 "internal") - 它不应为 "static" (除非它只包含 "AssemblyInitialize" 和/或 "AssemblyCleanup" 方法) - 它不应是泛型的。

trans-unit.source: Test class '{0}' should not be 'static'
trans-unit.target: 测试类“{0}”不应为“static”

trans-unit.source: Test class '{0}' should be 'public'
trans-unit.target: 测试类“{0}”应为“public”

trans-unit.source: Test class '{0}' should be 'public' or 'internal'
trans-unit.target: 测试类“{0}”应为“public”或“internal”

trans-unit.source: Test classes should have valid layout
trans-unit.target: 测试类应具有有效的布局

trans-unit.source: Test class should have at least one test method or be 'static' with method(s) marked by '[AssemblyInitialization]' and/or '[AssemblyCleanup]'.
trans-unit.target: 测试类应至少有一个测试方法，或者应为 "static" 且方法带有 "[AssemblyInitialization]" 和/或 "[AssemblyInitialization]"。

trans-unit.source: Test class '{0}' should have at least one test method or be 'static' with method(s) marked by '[AssemblyInitialization]' and/or '[AssemblyCleanup]'
trans-unit.target: 测试类“{0}”应至少有一个测试方法，或者应为 "static" 且方法带有 "[AssemblyInitialization]" 和/或 "[AssemblyInitialization]"。

trans-unit.source: Test class should have test method
trans-unit.target: 测试类应具有测试方法

trans-unit.source:
Methods marked with [TestCleanup] should follow the following layout to be valid: -it should be public -it should not be abstract -it should not be async void -it should not be static -it should not be a special method (finalizer, operator...). -it should not be generic -it should not take any parameter -return type should be void, Task or ValueTask
The type declaring these methods should also respect the following rules: -The type should be a class. -The class should be public or internal (if the test project is using the [DiscoverInternals] attribute). -The class shouldn't be static. -If the class is sealed, it should be marked with [TestClass] (or a derived attribute).
trans-unit.target: 标记有 [TestCleanup] 的方法应遵循以下布局才会有效: - 是 “public” - 不是 “static” - 不是泛型的，也不是在泛型类上定义的 - 不是 “abstract” - 不采用任何参数 - 返回类型应为 "void"、"Task" 或 "ValueTask" - 不是 “async void” - 不是特殊方法(终结器、运算符...)。

trans-unit.source: TestCleanup method '{0}' signature is invalid
trans-unit.target: TestCleanup 方法“{0}”签名无效

trans-unit.source: TestCleanup method should have valid layout
trans-unit.target: TestCleanup 方法应该具有有效的布局

trans-unit.source: TestContext property should follow the following layout to be valid: - it should be a property - it should be 'public' (or 'internal' if '[assembly: DiscoverInternals]' attribute is set) - it should not be 'static' - it should not be readonly.
trans-unit.target: TestContext 属性应遵循以下布局才能生效： - 它应该是属性 - 它应为“public”(如果设置了“[assembly: DiscoverInternals]”属性，则应为“internal”) - 它不应为“static” - 它不应为只读。

trans-unit.source: Member 'TestContext' should be a property and not a field
trans-unit.target: 成员“TestContext”应为属性而不是字段

trans-unit.source: Property 'TestContext' should be settable
trans-unit.target: 属性“TestContext”应可设置

trans-unit.source: Property 'TestContext' should not be 'static'
trans-unit.target: 属性“TestContext”不应为“static”

trans-unit.source: Property 'TestContext' should be 'public'
trans-unit.target: 属性“TestContext”应为“public”

trans-unit.source: Property 'TestContext' should be 'public' or 'internal'
trans-unit.target: 属性“TestContext”应为“public”或“internal”

trans-unit.source: Test context property should have valid layout
trans-unit.target: 测试上下文属性应具有有效的布局

trans-unit.source:
Methods marked with [TestInitialize] should follow the following layout to be valid: -it should be public -it should not be abstract -it should not be async void -it should not be static -it should not be a special method (finalizer, operator...). -it should not be generic -it should not take any parameter -return type should be void, Task or ValueTask
The type declaring these methods should also respect the following rules: -The type should be a class. -The class should be public or internal (if the test project is using the [DiscoverInternals] attribute). -The class shouldn't be static. -If the class is sealed, it should be marked with [TestClass] (or a derived attribute).
trans-unit.target: 标记有 [TestInitialize] 的方法应遵循以下布局才会有效: - 是 “public” - 不是 “static” - 不是泛型的，也不是在泛型类上定义的 - 不是 “abstract” - 不采用任何参数 - 返回类型应为 "void"、"Task" 或 "ValueTask" - 不是 “async void” - 不是特殊方法(终结器、运算符...)。

trans-unit.source: TestInitialize method '{0}' signature is invalid
trans-unit.target: TestInitialize 方法“{0}”签名无效

trans-unit.source: TestInitialize method should have valid layout
trans-unit.target: TestInitialize 方法应具有有效的布局

trans-unit.source: Test methods, methods marked with the '[TestMethod]' attribute, should respect the following layout to be considered valid by MSTest: - it should be 'public' (or 'internal' if '[assembly: DiscoverInternals]' attribute is set) - it should not be 'static' - it should not be generic - it should not be 'abstract' - return type should be 'void', 'Task' or 'ValueTask' - it should not be 'async void' - it should not be a special method (finalizer, operator...).
trans-unit.target: 测试方法 (标记有“[TestMethod]”属性的方法) 应遵循以下布局，以供 MSTest 将其视为有效: - 它应该是“public” (如果设置了“[assembly: DiscoverInternals]”属性，则应该是“internal”) - 它不应为“static” - 它不应是泛型的 - 它不应为“abstract” - 返回类型应为“void”、“Task”或“ValueTask” - 它不应为“async void” - 它不应是特殊方法 (运算符、运算符...)。

trans-unit.source: Test method '{0}' should not be 'abstract'
trans-unit.target: 测试方法“{0}”不应为“abstract”

trans-unit.source: Test method '{0}' should not be 'async void'
trans-unit.target: 测试方法“{0}”不应为“async void”

trans-unit.target: 测试方法“{0}”不应是泛型

trans-unit.source: Test method '{0}' should not be 'static'
trans-unit.target: 测试方法“{0}”不应为“static”

trans-unit.source: Test method '{0}' should be an 'ordinary' method
trans-unit.target: 测试方法“{0}”应为一种“普通”方法

trans-unit.source: Test method '{0}' should be 'public'
trans-unit.target: 测试方法“{0}”应为“public”

trans-unit.target: 测试方法 '{0}' 应返回 'void'、'Task' 或 'ValueTask'

trans-unit.source: Test methods should have valid layout
trans-unit.target: 测试方法应具有有效的布局

trans-unit.target: 不应忽略测试方法(标记有 "[Ignore]")。

trans-unit.target: 不应忽略测试方法“{0}”

trans-unit.source: Test method should not be ignored
trans-unit.target: 不应忽略测试方法

trans-unit.source: Type contaning '[TestMethod]' should be marked with '[TestClass]', otherwise the test method will be silently ignored.
trans-unit.target: 应使用“[TestClass]”标记包含“[TestMethod]”的类型，否则将以静默方式忽略该测试方法。

trans-unit.source: Class '{0}' contains test methods and should be marked with '[TestClass]'
trans-unit.target: 类“{0}”包含测试方法，应使用“[TestClass]”进行标记

trans-unit.source: Type containing '[TestMethod]' should be marked with '[TestClass]'
trans-unit.target: 应使用“[TestClass]”标记包含“[TestMethod]”的类型

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous test fixture methods do not require the 'Async' suffix
trans-unit.target: 异步测试固定例程方法不需要 "Async" 后缀

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous test methods do not require the 'Async' suffix
trans-unit.target: 异步测试方法不需要 "Async" 后缀

trans-unit.source: [{0}] can only be set on methods marked with [TestMethod]
trans-unit.target: 只能对标记了 [TestMethod] 的方法设置 [{0}]

trans-unit.source: [{0}] can only be set on methods marked with [TestMethod]
trans-unit.target: 只能对标记了 [TestMethod] 的方法设置 [{0}]

trans-unit.source: '[DeploymentItem]' can be specified only on test class or test method
trans-unit.target: '[DeploymentItem]' can be specified only on test class or test method

trans-unit.source: '[DeploymentItem]' can be specified only on test class or test method
trans-unit.target: '[DeploymentItem]' can be specified only on test class or test method

trans-unit.source: By default, MSTest runs tests within the same assembly sequentially, which can lead to severe performance limitations. It is recommended to enable assembly attribute '[Parallelize]' to run tests in parallel, or if the assembly is known to not be parallelizable, to use explicitly the assembly level attribute '[DoNotParallelize]'.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，MSTest 将按顺序在同一程序集中运行测试，这可能会导致严重的性能限制。建议启用程序集属性“[Parallelize]”以并行运行测试，或者如果已知程序集不可并行，则显式使用程序集级别属性“DoNotParallelize”。

trans-unit.source: Explicitly enable or disable tests parallelization
trans-unit.target: 显式启用或禁用测试并行化

trans-unit.source: Explicitly enable or disable tests parallelization
